item.title: WebP Image Processing in Hugo
item.author: mail@khusika.dev (Khusika Dhamar Gusti)
item.description: WebP is a modern image format that provides superior lossless and lossy compression for images on the web. But for some reason, it is not supported in Hugo framework. In this section i would like to discuss about implementation of WebP in Hugo.
